20101215192413.667|20101215192415.333|CCO|WE'RE FOLLOWING BREAKING NEWS ON
20101215192415.333|20101215192417.000|CCO|"NEWS NATION" OUT OF WASHINGTON.
20101215192417.000|20101215192418.667|CCO|THE JUSTICE DEPARTMENT HAS FILED
20101215192418.667|20101215192420.333|CCO|CIVIL LAWSUITS AGAINST BP AND 
20101215192420.333|20101215192422.000|CCO|EIGHT OTHER COMPANIES INVOLVED 
20101215192422.000|20101215192424.000|CCO|IN A MASSIVE GULF OIL SPILL LAST
20101215192424.000|20101215192426.000|CCO|APRIL.
20101215192426.000|20101215192428.000|CCO|LET'S LISTEN IN TO ERIC HOLDER.
20101215192428.000|20101215192430.000|CCO|>> I'VE SEEN THE DEVASTATION 
20101215192430.000|20101215192432.000|CCO|THAT THIS OIL SPILL CAUSED 
20101215192432.000|20101215192434.000|CCO|THROUGHOUT THE REGION, TO 
20101215192434.000|20101215192436.000|CCO|INDIVIDUALS AND TO FAMILIES, TO 
20101215192436.000|20101215192438.000|CCO|COMMUNITIES AND TO BUSINESSES.
20101215192438.000|20101215192440.000|CCO|TO COASTLINES, TO WETLANDS AS 
20101215192440.000|20101215192442.000|CCO|WELL AS TO WILDLIFE.
20101215192442.000|20101215192443.667|CCO|EVEN THOUGH THE SPILL HAS BEEN 
20101215192443.667|20101215192445.333|CCO|CONTAINED, EVEN THOUGH IT NO 
20101215192445.333|20101215192447.000|CCO|LONGER IS THE FOCUS OF THE 
20101215192447.000|20101215192448.667|CCO|ROUND-THE-CLOCK NEWS COVERAGE 
20101215192448.667|20101215192450.333|CCO|THAT WE SAW AND THE SUBJECT OF 
20101215192450.333|20101215192452.000|CCO|FRONT-PAGE HEADLINES, THE 
20101215192452.000|20101215192453.429|CCO|DEPARTMENT'S FOCUS ON 
20101215192453.429|20101215192454.857|CCO|INVESTIGATING THIS DISASTER AND 
20101215192454.857|20101215192456.286|CCO|PREVENTING FUTURE DEVASTATION 
20101215192456.286|20101215192457.714|CCO|HAS NOT WAVERED.
20101215192457.714|20101215192459.143|CCO|WHILE TODAY'S CIVIL ACTION MARKS
20101215192459.143|20101215192500.571|CCO|A CRUCIAL FIRST STEP FORWARD, IT
20101215192500.571|20101215192502.000|CCO|IS NOT -- IT IS NOT A FINAL 
20101215192502.000|20101215192504.000|CCO|STEP.
20101215192504.000|20101215192506.000|CCO|BOTH ARE CRIMINAL AND CIVIL 
20101215192506.000|20101215192508.000|CCO|INVESTIGATIONS.
20101215192508.000|20101215192510.000|CCO|THEY ARE CONTINUING AND OUR WORK
20101215192510.000|20101215192512.000|CCO|TO ENSURE THAT THE AMERICAN 
20101215192512.000|20101215192514.000|CCO|TAXPAYERS ARE NOT FORCED TO BEAR
20101215192514.000|20101215192516.000|CCO|THE COSTS OF RESTORING THE GULF 
20101215192516.000|20101215192518.000|CCO|AREA AND ITS ECONOMY GOES ON.
